Invite a guest to join your stream from: Invite a guest to join your stream from a web browser.
Guest Cam is currently listening for con: Guest Cam is currently listening for connecting guests, but is not broadcasting your microphone and webcam to your guests yet.
No microphone source is selected. Your g: No microphone source is selected. Your guest will not be able to hear you.
No webcam source is selected. Your guest: No webcam source is selected. Your guest will not be able to see you.
You will need to select a microphone and: You will need to select a microphone and webcam source in your current scene collection that will be sent to your guests for them to see and hear you.
A guest has joined - click to show: A guest has joined - click to show
Copy and share a link with your guest. W: Copy and share a link with your guest. When they join, they'll be able to see and hear you.
Verify their identity in the preview are: Verify their identity in the preview area. When ready, add them to your stream by clicking 'Show on Stream'.
Enjoy your stream! Adjust their volume,: Enjoy your stream! Adjust their volume, create new links, and change your mic and camera from the properties window.
Don't share your invite link with anyone: Don't share your invite link with anyone you don't want on your stream. You can invalidate an old link by generating a new one. Do not show this window on stream.
Collab Cam is not yet sending your video: Collab Cam is not yet sending your video and audio to guests. Start Collab Cam?
